dialogues.speaker: sheep
text: Taking away the heat from me a bit! Hahaha~
I can't take away the heat, but how about a cool drink?
더위를 가져갈 수는 없지만 시원한 음료 하나 대접은 가능하죠!
Hahaha, shall I take away the heat for a moment?

dialogues.speaker: sheep
answer: Hahaha, you sure have some sense!
Hahaha, you're quite a clever one!
Seems you're still a bit chilly...
